title: The Brand New Monty Python Papperbok
description: This is the scarce edition with the original "dirty fingerprints" dustjacket. From "The Brand New Monty Python Bok was the second book to be published by the British comedy troupe Monty Python. It was edited by Eric Idle, and contained more print-style comic pieces than their first effort, Monty Python's Big Red Book.
author: Graham Chapman
